label: 紀長谷雄
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (845-912). Also known as Ki Nagon 紀納言 (the Ki Counsellor"). "Erudite" of literature. Private collection Kikashu 紀家集.　Kanshi in Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集 (23), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (13), and Sakumon daitai (3). [漢詩、作文大体] "
